verses.verse: וְהָ֣אָדָ֔ם <S%H120><s%> And Adam יָדַ֖ע <S%H3045><s%> had אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> חַוָּ֣ה <S%H2332><s%> Eve אִשְׁתּ֑וֹ <S%H802><s%> his wife וַתַּ֙הַר֙ <S%H2029><s%> and she conceived וַתֵּ֣לֶד <S%H3205><s%> and gave אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> קַ֔יִן <S%H7014><s%> Cain וַתֹּ֕אמֶר <S%H559><s%> and said קָנִ֥יתִי <S%H7069><s%> I have gotten אִ֖ישׁ <S%H376><s%> a man אֶת־ <S%H854><s%> from יְהוָֽה׃ <S%H3068><s%> the LORD

וַתֹּ֣סֶף <S%H3254><s%> And she again לָלֶ֔דֶת <S%H3205><s%> bare אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> אָחִ֖יו <S%H251><s%> his brother אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> הָ֑בֶל <S%H1893><s%> Abel וַֽיְהִי־ <S%H1961><s%> become הֶ֙בֶל֙ <S%H1893><s%> And Abel רֹ֣עֵה <S%H7462><s%> was a keeper צֹ֔אן <S%H6629><s%> of sheep וְקַ֕יִן <S%H7014><s%> but Cain הָיָ֖ה <S%H1961><s%> become עֹבֵ֥ד <S%H5647><s%> was a tiller אֲדָמָֽה׃ <S%H127><s%> of the ground

וַֽיְהִ֖י <S%H1961><s%> came מִקֵּ֣ץ <S%H7093><s%> And in process יָמִ֑ים <S%H3117><s%> of time וַיָּבֵ֨א <S%H935><s%> brought קַ֜יִן <S%H7014><s%> it came to pass that Cain מִפְּרִ֧י <S%H6529><s%> of the fruit הָֽאֲדָמָ֛ה <S%H127><s%> of the ground מִנְחָ֖ה <S%H4503><s%> an offering לַֽיהוָֽה׃ <S%H3068><s%> unto the LORD

וְהֶ֨בֶל <S%H1893><s%> And Abel הֵבִ֥יא <S%H935><s%> also brought גַם־ <S%H1571><s%> his part ה֛וּא <S%H1931><s%> he מִבְּכֹר֥וֹת <S%H1062><s%> of the firstlings צֹאנ֖וֹ <S%H6629><s%> of his flock וּמֵֽחֶלְבֵהֶ֑ן <S%H2459><s%> and of the fat וַיִּ֣שַׁע <S%H8159><s%> had respect יְהוָ֔ה <S%H3068><s%> thereof And the LORD אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> about הֶ֖בֶל <S%H1893><s%> unto Abel וְאֶל־ <S%H413><s%> and מִנְחָתֽוֹ׃ <S%H4503><s%> and to his offering

וְאֶל־ <S%H413><s%> about קַ֥יִן <S%H7014><s%> But unto Cain וְאֶל־ <S%H413><s%> and מִנְחָת֖וֹ <S%H4503><s%> and to his offering לֹ֣א <S%H3808><s%> no שָׁעָ֑ה <S%H8159><s%> he had not respect וַיִּ֤חַר <S%H2734><s%> wroth לְקַ֙יִן֙ <S%H7014><s%> And Cain מְאֹ֔ד <S%H3966><s%> was very וַֽיִּפְּל֖וּ <S%H5307><s%> fell פָּנָֽיו׃ <S%H6440><s%> and his countenance

וַיֹּ֥אמֶר <S%H559><s%> said יְהוָ֖ה <S%H3068><s%> And the LORD אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to קָ֑יִן <S%H7014><s%> unto Cain לָ֚מָּה <S%H4100><s%> Why חָ֣רָה <S%H2734><s%> Why art thou wroth לָ֔ךְ וְלָ֖מָּה <S%H4100><s%> Why נָפְל֥וּ <S%H5307><s%> fallen פָנֶֽיךָ׃ <S%H6440><s%> ? and why is thy countenance

הֲל֤וֹא <S%H3808><s%> not אִם־ <S%H518><s%> If תֵּיטִיב֙ <S%H3190><s%> thou doest well שְׂאֵ֔ת <S%H7613><s%> will not be lifted וְאִם֙ <S%H518><s%> and if לֹ֣א <S%H3808><s%> not תֵיטִ֔יב <S%H3190><s%> well לַפֶּ֖תַח <S%H6607><s%> at the door חַטָּ֣את <S%H2403><s%> sin רֹבֵ֑ץ <S%H7257><s%> lieth וְאֵלֶ֙יךָ֙ <S%H413><s%> and תְּשׁ֣וּקָת֔וֹ <S%H8669><s%> And unto thee [shall be] his desire וְאַתָּ֖ה <S%H859><s%> you תִּמְשָׁל־ <S%H4910><s%> and thou shalt rule בּֽוֹ׃

וַיֹּ֥אמֶר <S%H559><s%> talked קַ֖יִן <S%H7014><s%> And Cain אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> with הֶ֣בֶל <S%H1893><s%> Abel אָחִ֑יו <S%H251><s%> his brother וַֽיְהִי֙ <S%H1961><s%> came בִּהְיוֹתָ֣ם <S%H1961><s%> came בַּשָּׂדֶ֔ה <S%H7704><s%> and it came to pass when they were in the field וַיָּ֥קָם <S%H6965><s%> rose up קַ֛יִן <S%H7014><s%> that Cain אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> against הֶ֥בֶל <S%H1893><s%> Abel אָחִ֖יו <S%H251><s%> his brother וַיַּהַרְגֵֽהוּ׃ <S%H2026><s%> and slew him

וַיֹּ֤אמֶר <S%H559><s%> said יְהוָה֙ <S%H3068><s%> And the LORD אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to קַ֔יִן <S%H7014><s%> unto Cain אֵ֖י <S%H335><s%> Where הֶ֣בֶל <S%H1893><s%> [is] Abel אָחִ֑יךָ <S%H251><s%> not [Am] I my brother's וַיֹּ֙אמֶר֙ <S%H559><s%> said לֹ֣א <S%H3808><s%> not יָדַ֔עְתִּי <S%H3045><s%> I know הֲשֹׁמֵ֥ר <S%H8104><s%> keeper אָחִ֖י <S%H251><s%> my brother's אָנֹֽכִי׃ <S%H595><s%> He

וַיֹּ֖אמֶר <S%H559><s%> And he said מֶ֣ה <S%H4100><s%> What עָשִׂ֑יתָ <S%H6213><s%> hast thou done ק֚וֹל <S%H6963><s%> ? the voice דְּמֵ֣י <S%H1818><s%> blood אָחִ֔יךָ <S%H251><s%> of thy brother's צֹעֲקִ֥ים <S%H6817><s%> crieth אֵלַ֖י <S%H413><s%> about מִן־ <S%H4480><s%> from הָֽאֲדָמָֽה׃ <S%H127><s%> unto me from the ground

וְעַתָּ֖ה <S%H6258><s%> Now אָר֣וּר <S%H779><s%> And now [art] thou cursed אָ֑תָּה <S%H859><s%> you מִן־ <S%H4480><s%> from הָֽאֲדָמָה֙ <S%H127><s%> from the earth אֲשֶׁ֣ר <S%H834><s%> which פָּצְתָ֣ה <S%H6475><s%> which hath opened אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> פִּ֔יהָ <S%H6310><s%> her mouth לָקַ֛חַת <S%H3947><s%> to receive אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> דְּמֵ֥י <S%H1818><s%> blood אָחִ֖יךָ <S%H251><s%> thy brother's מִיָּדֶֽךָ׃ <S%H3027><s%> from thy hand

כִּ֤י <S%H3588><s%> When תַֽעֲבֹד֙ <S%H5647><s%> thou tillest אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> הָ֣אֲדָמָ֔ה <S%H127><s%> the ground לֹֽא־ <S%H3808><s%> will no תֹסֵ֥ף <S%H3254><s%> it shall not henceforth תֵּת־ <S%H5414><s%> yield כֹּחָ֖הּ <S%H3581><s%> unto thee her strength לָ֑ךְ נָ֥ע <S%H5128><s%> a fugitive וָנָ֖ד <S%H5110><s%> and a vagabond תִּֽהְיֶ֥ה <S%H1961><s%> become בָאָֽרֶץ׃ <S%H776><s%> shalt thou be in the earth

וַיֹּ֥אמֶר <S%H559><s%> said קַ֖יִן <S%H7014><s%> And Cain אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to יְהוָ֑ה <S%H3068><s%> unto the LORD גָּד֥וֹל <S%H1419><s%> [is] greater עֲוֹנִ֖י <S%H5771><s%> My punishment מִנְּשֹֽׂא׃ <S%H5375><s%> than I can bear

הֵן֩ <S%H2005><s%> Behold גֵּרַ֨שְׁתָּ <S%H1644><s%> Behold thou hast driven me out אֹתִ֜י <S%H853><s%> הַיּ֗וֹם <S%H3117><s%> this day מֵעַל֙ <S%H5921><s%> and from פְּנֵ֣י <S%H6440><s%> from the face הָֽאֲדָמָ֔ה <S%H127><s%> of the earth וּמִפָּנֶ֖יךָ <S%H6440><s%> thy face אֶסָּתֵ֑ר <S%H5641><s%> shall I be hid וְהָיִ֜יתִי <S%H1961><s%> and it shall come to pass נָ֤ע <S%H5128><s%> and I shall be a fugitive וָנָד֙ <S%H5110><s%> and a vagabond בָּאָ֔רֶץ <S%H776><s%> in the earth וְהָיָ֥ה <S%H1961><s%> become כָל־ <S%H3605><s%> and whoever מֹצְאִ֖י <S%H4672><s%> [that] every one that findeth me יַֽהַרְגֵֽנִי׃ <S%H2026><s%> shall slay me

וַיֹּ֧אמֶר <S%H559><s%> said ל֣וֹ יְהוָ֗ה <S%H3068><s%> And the LORD לָכֵן֙ <S%H3651><s%> unto him Therefore כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> whoever הֹרֵ֣ג <S%H2026><s%> whosoever slayeth קַ֔יִן <S%H7014><s%> Cain שִׁבְעָתַ֖יִם <S%H7659><s%> on him sevenfold יֻקָּ֑ם <S%H5358><s%> vengeance shall be taken וַיָּ֨שֶׂם <S%H7760><s%> set יְהוָ֤ה <S%H3068><s%> And the LORD לְקַ֙יִן֙ <S%H7014><s%> upon Cain א֔וֹת <S%H226><s%> a mark לְבִלְתִּ֥י <S%H1115><s%> lest הַכּוֹת־ <S%H5221><s%> him should kill אֹת֖וֹ <S%H853><s%> כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> no מֹצְאֽוֹ׃ <S%H4672><s%> any finding

וַיֵּ֥צֵא <S%H3318><s%> went out קַ֖יִן <S%H7014><s%> And Cain מִלִּפְנֵ֣י <S%H6440><s%> from the presence יְהוָ֑ה <S%H3068><s%> of the LORD וַיֵּ֥שֶׁב <S%H3427><s%> and dwelt בְּאֶֽרֶץ־ <S%H776><s%> in the land נ֖וֹד <S%H5113><s%> of Nod קִדְמַת־ <S%H6926><s%> on the east עֵֽדֶן׃ <S%H5731><s%> of Eden

וַיֵּ֤דַע <S%H3045><s%> knew קַ֙יִן֙ <S%H7014><s%> And Cain אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> אִשְׁתּ֔וֹ <S%H802><s%> his wife וַתַּ֖הַר <S%H2029><s%> and she conceived וַתֵּ֣לֶד <S%H3205><s%> and bare אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> חֲנ֑וֹךְ <S%H2585><s%> Enoch וַֽיְהִי֙ <S%H1961><s%> become בֹּ֣נֶה <S%H1129><s%> and he builded עִ֔יר <S%H5892><s%> a city וַיִּקְרָא֙ <S%H7121><s%> and called שֵׁ֣ם <S%H8034><s%> the name הָעִ֔יר <S%H5892><s%> of the city כְּשֵׁ֖ם <S%H8034><s%> after the name בְּנ֥וֹ <S%H1121><s%> of his son חֲנֽוֹךְ׃ <S%H2585><s%> Enoch

וַיִּוָּלֵ֤ד <S%H3205><s%> was born לַֽחֲנוֹךְ֙ <S%H2585><s%> And unto Enoch אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> עִירָ֔ד <S%H5897><s%> Irad וְעִירָ֕ד <S%H5897><s%> and Irad יָלַ֖ד <S%H3205><s%> begat אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> מְחֽוּיָאֵ֑ל <S%H4232><s%> Mehujael וּמְחִיּיָאֵ֗ל <S%H4232><s%> and Mehujael יָלַד֙ <S%H3205><s%> begat אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> מְת֣וּשָׁאֵ֔ל <S%H4967><s%> Methusael וּמְתוּשָׁאֵ֖ל <S%H4967><s%> and Methusael יָלַ֥ד <S%H3205><s%> begat אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> לָֽמֶךְ׃ <S%H3929><s%> Lamech

וַיִּֽקַּֽח־ <S%H3947><s%> took ל֥וֹ לֶ֖מֶךְ <S%H3929><s%> And Lamech שְׁתֵּ֣י <S%H8147><s%> unto him two נָשִׁ֑ים <S%H802><s%> wives שֵׁ֤ם <S%H8034><s%> the name הָֽאַחַת֙ <S%H259><s%> of the one עָדָ֔ה <S%H5711><s%> [was] Adah וְשֵׁ֥ם <S%H8034><s%> and the name הַשֵּׁנִ֖ית <S%H8145><s%> of the other צִלָּֽה׃ <S%H6741><s%> Zillah

וַתֵּ֥לֶד <S%H3205><s%> bare עָדָ֖ה <S%H5711><s%> And Adah אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> יָבָ֑ל <S%H2989><s%> Jabal ה֣וּא <S%H1931><s%> he הָיָ֔ה <S%H1961><s%> was אֲבִ֕י <S%H1><s%> he was the father יֹשֵׁ֥ב <S%H3427><s%> of such as dwell אֹ֖הֶל <S%H168><s%> in tents וּמִקְנֶֽה׃ <S%H4735><s%> and [of such as have] cattle

וְשֵׁ֥ם <S%H8034><s%> name אָחִ֖יו <S%H251><s%> And his brother's יוּבָ֑ל <S%H3106><s%> [was] Jubal ה֣וּא <S%H1931><s%> he הָיָ֔ה <S%H1961><s%> become אֲבִ֕י <S%H1><s%> he was the father כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> of all תֹּפֵ֥שׂ <S%H8610><s%> of all such as handle כִּנּ֖וֹר <S%H3658><s%> the harp וְעוּגָֽב׃ <S%H5748><s%> and organ

וְצִלָּ֣ה <S%H6741><s%> And Zillah גַם־ <S%H1571><s%> also הִ֗וא <S%H1931><s%> he יָֽלְדָה֙ <S%H3205><s%> she also bare אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> תּ֣וּבַל קַ֔יִן <S%H8423><s%> Tubalcain לֹטֵ֕שׁ <S%H3913><s%> an instructer כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> of all חֹרֵ֥שׁ <S%H2794><s%> of every artificer נְחֹ֖שֶׁת <S%H5178><s%> in brass וּבַרְזֶ֑ל <S%H1270><s%> and iron וַֽאֲח֥וֹת <S%H269><s%> and the sister תּֽוּבַל־ קַ֖יִן <S%H8423><s%> of Tubalcain נַֽעֲמָֽה׃ <S%H5279><s%> [was] Naamah

וַיֹּ֨אמֶר <S%H559><s%> said לֶ֜מֶךְ <S%H3929><s%> And Lamech לְנָשָׁ֗יו <S%H802><s%> unto his wives עָדָ֤ה <S%H5711><s%> Adah וְצִלָּה֙ <S%H6741><s%> and Zillah שְׁמַ֣עַן <S%H8085><s%> Hear קוֹלִ֔י <S%H6963><s%> my voice נְשֵׁ֣י <S%H802><s%> ye wives לֶ֔מֶךְ <S%H3929><s%> of Lamech הַאְזֵ֖נָּה <S%H238><s%> hearken אִמְרָתִ֑י <S%H565><s%> unto my speech כִּ֣י <S%H3588><s%> for אִ֤ישׁ <S%H582><s%> I הָרַ֙גְתִּי֙ <S%H2026><s%> for I have slain לְפִצְעִ֔י <S%H6482><s%> to my wounding וְיֶ֖לֶד <S%H3206><s%> and a young man לְחַבֻּרָתִֽי׃ <S%H2250><s%> to my hurt

כִּ֥י <S%H3588><s%> If שִׁבְעָתַ֖יִם <S%H7659><s%> sevenfold יֻקַּם־ <S%H5358><s%> shall be avenged קָ֑יִן <S%H7014><s%> Cain וְלֶ֖מֶךְ <S%H3929><s%> truly Lamech שִׁבְעִ֥ים <S%H7657><s%> seventy וְשִׁבְעָֽה׃ <S%H7651><s%> and sevenfold

וַיֵּ֨דַע <S%H3045><s%> knew אָדָ֥ם <S%H121><s%> Adam עוֹד֙ <S%H5750><s%> again אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> אִשְׁתּ֔וֹ <S%H802><s%> his wife וַתֵּ֣לֶד <S%H3205><s%> and she bare בֵּ֔ן <S%H1121><s%> a son וַתִּקְרָ֥א <S%H7121><s%> and called אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> שְׁמ֖וֹ <S%H8034><s%> his name שֵׁ֑ת <S%H8352><s%> Seth כִּ֣י <S%H3588><s%> whom שָֽׁת־ <S%H7896><s%> [said she] hath appointed לִ֤י אֱלֹהִים֙ <S%H430><s%> For God זֶ֣רַע <S%H2233><s%> seed אַחֵ֔ר <S%H312><s%> me another תַּ֣חַת <S%H8478><s%> instead הֶ֔בֶל <S%H1893><s%> of Abel כִּ֥י <S%H3588><s%> for הֲרָג֖וֹ <S%H2026><s%> slew קָֽיִן׃ <S%H7014><s%> Cain

וּלְשֵׁ֤ת <S%H8352><s%> And to Seth גַּם־ <S%H1571><s%> also הוּא֙ <S%H1931><s%> to him יֻלַּד־ <S%H3205><s%> also there was born בֵּ֔ן <S%H1121><s%> a son וַיִּקְרָ֥א <S%H7121><s%> and he called אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> שְׁמ֖וֹ <S%H8034><s%> his name אֱנ֑וֹשׁ <S%H583><s%> Enos אָ֣ז <S%H227><s%> Then הוּחַ֔ל <S%H2490><s%> then began men לִקְרֹ֖א <S%H7121><s%> to call בְּשֵׁ֥ם <S%H8034><s%> upon the name יְהוָֽה׃ <S%H3068><s%> of the LORD פ
